branchCategory.name: ZSE10, Digital Pressure Switch, Vacuum/Compound Pressure
branchCategory.description: <p>ZSE10 compact, digital pressure switch for vacuum/compound pressure has been reduced in height by approximately 50% when compared to the ZSE30A.&nbsp; Up to 10&nbsp;remote sensors can be set at once using the copy settings function.&nbsp; Options include&nbsp;direct mount, panel mount&nbsp;or DIN rail mount, and a choice of 2 piping directions.&nbsp;</p>

breadCrumb.name: ZSE10, Digital Pressure Switch, Vacuum/Compound Pressure
